definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Out of control, Bonasera leaned forward toward the aisle and shouted hoarsely.
sentences.chinese: 失去了控制，勃納瑟拉向過道前傾，嘶啞地吼道。

sentences.english: It consists of multiple passages and empty rooms.
sentences.chinese: 這層樓面上有多條過道和多個空房間。

sentences.english: I saw her hobble down the aisle.
sentences.chinese: 我看見她在過道邊蹦跳着移動。

sentences.english: He hides in the catwalks with a three foot piece of pipe in his hands.
sentences.chinese: 他躲在過道上，手拿着一支一米左右的金屬管。

sentences.english: I rushed for the door and fell over the cat in the hallway.
sentences.chinese: 我衝向門口，在過道踢到一隻貓而摔了一跤。

sentences.english: We strode down the open corridors together in our solitary fancy tasting artichokes.
sentences.chinese: 我們一起來到寬敞的過道在寂寞中奇想品嚐洋薊。

sentences.english: She moved out of the closet, into the hall.
sentences.chinese: 她搬出了壁櫥，住進了過道里。

sentences.english: How did you feel as you stepped out of the tunnel at the Stadio Olimpico?
sentences.chinese: 當你走出奧林匹克球場的過道時是什麼感覺？

sentences.english: in the passage the passenger passed a cassette of message to messenger.
sentences.chinese: 在過道里，搭客給信差傳遞了一盒帶信息。

sentences.english: There was a mansion on the island, which was connected to an old castle by a passageway.
sentences.chinese: 島上有座府邸，通過一條過道連向另一座舊城堡。

sentences.english: He strided the hall of the building, look for the exit.
sentences.chinese: 他在大樓的過道里大步走著，尋找出口。

sentences.english: The man's screams subsided, but dry sobs echoed through the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 那男人的叫聲低了下去，但抽噎聲還在過道里迴響。

sentences.english: The paintings hang in a single, long space in the gallery.
sentences.chinese: 畫作在畫廊裏一條單獨的，長條狀的過道展覽。

sentences.english: Sprinkle cat litter or sand on icy patches.
sentences.chinese: 把貓砂或者是沙子撒在過道上。

sentences.english: There, standing in the hall was a woman Ellie didn't recognize.
sentences.chinese: 打開門，站在過道的是一個愛麗並不認識的女人。

sentences.english: The cons move through the halls to the infirmary door.
sentences.chinese: 團伙們穿過了過道，來到醫務室門口。

definition: head of a flight of stairs
to enter a door/to go in/to learn the basics of a subject/to join one's husband's household upon marriage
